item.title: Water to centre line after minimal rain, 8th July
item.description:
Suspected blocked drainage system opposite farm, ponding to centre of c/way whenever it rains. Safety issue on 50mph stretch of A38

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 8th July
item.description:
Hi Sarah Meant to mention this earlier - very overgrown now/tricky to pass walkers. And the vision splays onto Churchdown Lane are overgrown, making it trick/dangerous to pull out from Stump Lane. Can you ask Highways to see if they can cut it back?
Report on FixMyStreet
